participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and caring, with a strong focus on academics and personal goals.
participant_1.background: i make straight as in school. i am currently in high school. my current goal is to run a k. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i won homecoming queen this year.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a passion for music and community service.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
